fields.name: Orlan
fields.description:
The Orlan is a new hotel center which offers comfortable apartments, a restaurant with delicious cuisine, a hair dressing salon for ladies and men, etc.   

Hotel

In the hotel Orlan there are 11 modern apartments:

  • 3 de luxe class, UAH 600
  • honeymoon apartment (de luxe class), UAH 700
  • 3 semi luxe class, UAH 500
  • 4 standard, UAH 250 

Each apartment has a topic style of its own which dictates the choice of furniture, paintings, textile decoration. 

There is an air conditioner, TV, a refrigerator in each apartment. Some rooms are furnished with shower cabins, other with Jacuzzi. In bathrooms there are all necessary things such as bathrobes, towels, slippers, soaps, toothpaste, a toothbrush, a hairdryer.

Visitors of the hotel center are offered the guarded covered parking lot.

Wi-Fi Internet is available.     

Apartments are booked by advance payment.

Restaurant

The restaurant of Ukrainian homemade cuisine is open from 11:00 to 23:00. In its menu there are meals prepared on grill, fish, meat, vegetable dishes, home-canned products, draft beer, juices, alcoholic drinks, etc.

There is a hall for smokers in the restaurant.

Celebration of jubilees, birthday parties or other events may be held in one of three banquet halls or in the large hall for 130 guests.

The roofed terrace is especially good for rest in summer time.

The honeymoon apartment with double Jacuzzi is offered for newly wedded couples celebrating their wedding in Orlan. The apartment will cost UAH 350, if there are less than 70 guests, and it will be free of charge if 80–100 guests are invited.

Grocery shop

The Grocery shop 'Orlan' is open from 07:00 till 22:30.

fields.name: Pidkova
fields.description:
Pidkova entertainment recreation center is a castle of enjoyments where you may have fun with your friends, spend weekend with your family, eat an appetizing meal, take a steam-bath or enjoy any other service all week round.

The center is situated by the central street of the city in three adjacent buildings. The facade of the central building looks like an ancient castle with towers and a tower clock.

At night Pidkova is illuminated by a power searchlight mounted on the roof. It will help you to easily found this wonderful fairy place.

The entertainment recreation center offers to its guests a modern comfortable hotel with 17 apartments, a pub, a cafe-billiard, a summer double deck terrace, a sauna and a large swimming pool.

The hotel Pidkova; differs with its comfort, coziness and reasonable prices.

The hotel has the modern interior: three floors are in different styles — Ukrainian, Eastern and European.

There are 17 apartments in the hotel Pidkova. Each of them is furnished with a minisafe, a minibar, an air conditioner, telephone, free Internet (an extra charge for high speed Internet) and TV.  TV sets are programmed against an excessive noise level not to disturb other visitors. Besides, in the apartments there is a safe for larger things and a room for over-dimensioned luggage. Entry to an apartment is by means of an electronic lock and a plastic key-card. Despite small number of rooms the hotel is equipped with a silent elevator not violating silence and rest of our guests.

Payment for accommodation is to be done by 12 o’clock.

Pub

More than 20 brands of beer (6 brands of draft beer) made by the best world brewers and beer snacks one may taste in the pub Pidkova.

Pastrami, matsyk, hamon, hunter sausages on fire, smoke pork ears with mustard and the specialty of the house for pint pots — heartlets on charcoal grill.

You are offered delicious homemade meal prepared in the Russian furnace, on the tandoor or charcoal grill. Shashlyk of moist pork, stake of veal or salmon, carps with vegetables on grill, luleh kebab are good dishes for your festive board.

In the pub there are also three banquet halls and a dancing hall. Live music will create an unforgettable atmosphere.

From 12:00 to 15:00 is a time for the special proposition 'Bachelors lunch' at special prices.

Cafe-billiard

In the cafe Pidkova you may order celebration of festive events, corporate and jubilee parties.

The billiard hall invites amateurs of the Russian and American billiard. Tables 'Buffalo', billiard-ball 'Aramith', handmade cues.

Sauna

The dry Finnish sauna of selected sorts of wood helps to relax, cleanse the body and renovate energy.

After the sauna you may take a shower or a jump into cooling barrel.

The sauna is designed for 6 people. The price is UAH 100/1 hour, sauna+swimming pool — UAH 110/hour. 

Swimming pool

The large swimming pool (20×4 m) is equipped with a hydro massager, a geyser and a water fall.

The price is UAH 30/1 hour.

You may buy subscription ticket (UAH 270/12 hours or UAH 400/unlimited) or order the whole swimming pool (UAH 250/1 hour).

Towels, sheets, bathrobes are offered for an extra pay.

Pidkova offers pleasant atmosphere, good servicing and polite personnel.

fields.name: Istanbul
fields.description:
The restaurant Istanbul offers:

  • corporate parties, buffet lunches, weddings (there is a hall for 140 persons)
  • an honeymoon room with illuminated Jacuzzi 'Ravak'
  • a variety of dishes
  • alive music from 08:00 to 23:45
  • set menus from 12:00 to 16:00
  • Wi-Fi Internet
  • a Turkish bath (hammam) and a steam room 24h, massage, pilling
  • a wood-fired grill
  • birthdays and festive events celebration in the Turkish bath with dishes delivered from the restaurant

'The world is magnificent as there is a place where we can meet...'
